name: Lari Lari
description:
Description:

This simple side scrolling game tests your agility. There are 2 modes, endless and a dragonfly chase mode with an easy, medium and hard difficulty. All scores are integrated with the online leaderboard. Let's play and be number 1!

How to play:

  • Right ( → ): dash
  • Up ( ↑ ): jump
  • Down ( ↓ ): slide

Asset Used:

  • Sprite, Platformer by Gameart2d
  • Bangers font by Bangers
  • Desert Caravan by Aaron Kenny
  • Button Sound Effect by ThirdOctave
  • Wave Run by Tad
  • Run Sound Effect by Jagadamba
  • Dash Sound Effect by Bart K.
  • Dragonfly by pngtree
  • Jump by CrystalGamesSpace
